title: How to Find All of the Heart Containers in the Legend of Zelda

steps.headline: Head four screens right from the start screen and make sure you have at least one bomb, which can be purchased from any merchant.
steps.description: On the left side of the rocky face next to the opening, place a bomb. Head into the resulting cave and grab the Heart Container.

steps.headline: Head right one screen, up five, and right four from the start screen.
steps.description: Place a bomb on the right side of the large rock and enter the cave. Grab the Heart Container.

steps.headline: Buy the Blue Candle from a merchant or get the Red Candle from Level 7.
steps.description: From the start screen, head right one screen, up three, and left one. Burn the fifth bush from the right and grab the Heart Container in the cave.

steps.headline: Make sure you have the raft.
steps.description: From the start screen, head right eight screens, up four and then up once again with the raft. Head into the cave and grab the Heart Container.

steps.headline: Make sure you have the Stepladder.
steps.description: From the start screen, head right eight screens and up two. Use the stepladder to snag the Heart Container.

steps.headline: From the start screen, head up one screen, left five, up one and down on the left side, left one, through the Lost Woods and up four.
steps.description: Push the left of the two gravestones in the middle up. Walk into the cave and grab the Heart Container.

steps.headline: Make sure you have the Whistle.
steps.description: From the start screen, head right four screens, up four and left one. Use the Whistle and enter the resulting staircase. Grab the Heart Container.

steps.headline: Make sure you have the Whistle.
steps.description: From the start screen, head right one screen, up five, left one, up one, cross the river, head up one, then right one. Play the Whistle, enter the staircase and grab the Heart Container.

steps.headline: Follow the instructions from the First Quest for Heart Containers #4 and #5.
